record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 27, 2007)

[Page: H11008]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, due to a family emergency I missed the following votes on Thursday, September 27, 2007. I would have voted as follows: Taylor Amendment, Allows multiple peril and flood insurance coverage of apartment buildings up to the total of the number of dwelling units times the maximum coverage limit per residential unit--"yes"; Motion to recommit H.R. 3121--"no"; Final Passage of H.R. 3121--Flood Insurance Reform and Modernization Act of 2007--"yes"; Motion to Recommit H.R. 3567--"no"; Final passage H.R. 3567--Small Business Investment Expansion Act of 2007--"yes."
